summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period from August 1, 2017, to August 31, 2017. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, indicating the financial activity of an account during that month.

persons.name: Cynthia Rodriguez

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $11,486,851.35 on August 1, 2017.
The ending balance as of August 31, 2017, was $11,494,636.11.
Interest earned during the period was $7,804.76.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF return item fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
